name: Tsung Anxiety Rating Scale
interpretation: The score is determined in accordance with 4 gradations of the severity of the symptom for each item. Responses to items 5, 9, 13, 17, and 19 are encoded "mirrored".The maximum total score is 80. The anxiety index is calculated by dividing the total score obtained during the examination of the patient by the maximum possible total score (80).
answers: A significant part of the time

questions.question: I feel more nervous and anxious than usual
I feel a sense of fear for absolutely no reason
I get upset or panic easily
I feel like I can't pull myself together
I have a feeling of complete well-being, I feel that nothing bad will happen to me
My hands and feet are shaking and shaking
I have headaches, neck and back pain
I feel broken and get tired quickly

I have a feeling of rapid heartbeat
I get dizzy spells
I have bouts of weakness

I fall asleep easily and have a deep and refreshing sleep
